kql_query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType != "0"
| where AppDisplayName != "Microsoft Authentication Broker"
| summarize FailedAttempts = count() by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where FailedAttempts >= 5
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, FailedAttempts

context.conversation_context: User is developing detection for brute force authentication attacks against Azure AD
